I purchased prime and mainly play Dust II. I have just over 10 wins and am Silver II. Most games are pretty fun and random lobbies have been good so far. Not too tryhard, but you will get some people occasionally upset for being a noob. 

Cons: Need an easier system for bot matches. Having to use the console to setup the game is confusing. Should be able to buy unlimited utilities, etc within settings. There should be in game settings for bots, difficulty, placing bots on which team, how many, what guns they use, etc. having to pull up console commands for each thing you want to change is slow and it usually doesn't work.
